description: Second aett (8 runes) of Elder Futhark - runes 9-16

runes.name: Hagalaz
runes.lesson: Accept what breaks; find strength in the storm
runes.warning: Resistance to change, victim mentality, chaos

runes.name: Nauthiz
runes.lesson: Work with limitations; find freedom through discipline

runes.name: Isa
runes.lesson: Rest in the waiting; clarity comes through stillness

runes.name: Jera
runes.lesson: Trust the timing; what you plant will return

runes.name: Eihwaz
runes.lesson: Stand firm through change; death leads to rebirth
runes.warning: Rigidity, fear of transformation, clinging to old forms

runes.name: Perthro
runes.lesson: Trust the unknown; some things unfold in their time

runes.name: Algiz
runes.lesson: Connect to divine guidance; protect what matters

runes.name: Sowilo
runes.lesson: Shine your light; integrate all parts of yourself
runes.warning: Ego inflation, burning others, false confidence
